Name: Lotus Bloom
About the game: Lotus Bloom is a relaxing minimalist puzzle game. Connect orbs, generate energy and make flowers bloom. Features Brain-teasing gameplay mechanics, keeping each new challenge fresh. 48 hand-crafted puzzles. Beautiful, minimalist and zen aesthetic. A relaxing and original soundtrack. Steam Achievements.
